document.full_text: nfl players asked a federal judge on wednesday to deny the league's request to stay an order lifting a lockout, saying it is necessary to ensure america's most popular sport has a 2011 season.
document.title: nfl players ask court not to put lockout ruling on hold
lines_and_colors: nfl players asked a federal judge on wednesday to deny the league's request to stay an order lifting a lockout, saying it is necessary to ensure america's most popular sport has a 2011 season.
